Can pay in USDT on trx, ETH, or LTC.I don't mind using an escrow or going first if you have positive rep.Edit: Paypal or card doesn't make a difference to me.Edit2: I can give you the fiverr login and you can pay and remove your details.Edit3: I can also send one pm every hour so you can contact me on my tg: @kinja92
